overview: Join Spongebob and Patrick on a trip to the Great Barrier Reef, Plankton and Karen on a romantic cruise, Mr. Krabs and Pearl on a trip to the Ocean Mint, Patrick on a homebound holiday, and Sandy on a trip that's OUT OF THIS WORLD! Why, these vacations are so packed with adventure and hilarity, everyone might just need a vacation from their vacation!
tagline: It's Vacation Time In The Deep Blue Sea!
title: Spongebob’s Runaway Roadtrip
